title: lag with high fps
body: so in every game i usually have around 100fps but i t feels like i have 40 fps. when i activate vertical sync i have 60 fps and it runs smoothly but every 10 seconds i have fps drops. i tried everything from updating all drivers to reinstalling windows. i need help

replies.body: Are you running the game on Fullscreen?  If so, what happens if you switch to Borderless? See if that helps, but you might need to try setting a framecap via in-game options as well.
